mapper.sql: id, pid, resetId, applyDataId, verifyId, manageId, doctorCode, doctorName, deptCode, deptName, operateReason, operateDate, matchPersonId, matchPersonName, matchDate, reviewerId, reviewerName, reviewerDate, sendPersonId, sendPersonName, sendDate, currencyField, dataType, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, resultId
mapper.select: SELECT yb_handle_verify_data.* FROM yb_handle_verify_data INNER JOIN yb_handle_verify ON yb_handle_verify_data.pid = yb_handle_verify.id AND yb_handle_verify.IS_DELETEMARK = 1 WHERE yb_handle_verify_data.IS_DELETEMARK = 1 and yb_handle_verify_data.state =#{ state } and yb_handle_verify_data.dataType =#{ dataType } and yb_handle_verify.applyDateStr = #{ applyDateStr }
